thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: Paul Canning

author: Paul Canning
title: Paul Canning
text: Great service from rental cars, with whom I had crash waiver insurance at a good price. Car I ordered was the one I got. However be aware that the group from eurocar for whom rental cars act as the agents will try to get you to take out their insurance which is a lot more. I believe that rental cars insurance covers everything that the eurocar insurance does at a greater cost.
